import React from 'react' import style from './index.module.css' import Linkify from 'react-linkify' const time = string => { const date = new Date(string) const minutes = date.getMinutes() return `${date.getHours()}:${minutes < 10 ? '0' + minutes : minutes}` } export const Message = ({ user, createConvo }) => message => message.author ? (
  • createConvo({ user: message.author })} src="https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/ggdfgfdg123gdf?d=identicon&s=46" />
    {`${message.author.fullName} | ${time(message.time)}`}

    {message.content}

    • ) : null
